astroannimal1951028387452956798.content: As we get close to leaving
astroannimal1951028387452956798.author: astroannimal

astroannimal1950609726246412661.content: We will have dinner ready for your arrival. Godspeed, Crew-11!
astroannimal1950609726246412661.author: astroannimal

astroannimal1942661005307150803.content: Cities at night: St. Louis, Tampa, Kansas City
astroannimal1942661005307150803.author: astroannimal

astroannimal1925267814459249085.content: A nighttime pass over the Eastern and Southern United States. I was astounded at the scale of recent thunderstorms … some of these flashes are as large as cities!
astroannimal1925267814459249085.author: astroannimal
